name: The Bonding Of Isaac
description:
Controls:

  • WSAD movement
  • Arrow Key shooting
  • Hold Space and use Arrow Keys to switch ammo

Notes:

  • I recommend resizing the window to suit your needs
  • The hitbox of the sentences is a small circle in the center of them
  • No audio :(

Hotfix1 fixed the following bugs:

  • Picking up emotional baggage after clearing a Girl will crash the game (null pointer lol)
  • Doggo eyes stay red after they feel guilty about hurting you, even though they are no longer angry
